sentence:
Here are three stocks with buy rank and strong momentum characteristics for investors to consider today, December 20th:

Atkore International Group Inc. (ATKR): This company manufactures and distributes electrical and mechanical products and has a Zacks Rank #1 (Strong Buy) and witnessed the Zacks Consensus Estimate for its current year earnings increasing 3.6% over the last 60 days.

Atkore International Group Inc. price-consensus-chart | Atkore International Group Inc. Quote

Atkore International's shares gained 11.9% over the last one month in contrast with the S&P 500's decrease of 5.5%.

The company possesses a Momentum Score of B.

Atkore International Group Inc. price | Atkore International Group Inc. Quote

Etsy, Inc. (ETSY): This commerce platform provides services to make, sell and buy products online and offline and has a Zacks Rank #2 (Buy) and witnessed the Zacks Consensus Estimate for its current year earnings increasing 95.3% over the last 60 days.

Etsy, Inc. price-consensus-chart | Etsy, Inc. Quote

Etsy's shares gained 16.7% over the last one month.

The company possesses a Momentum Score of A.

Etsy, Inc. price | Etsy, Inc. Quote

salesforce.com, inc. (CRM): This company is an enterprise cloud computing services developer and has a Zacks Rank #2 and witnessed the Zacks Consensus Estimate for its current year earnings increasing 3.9% over the last 60 days.

salesforce.com, inc. price-consensus-chart | salesforce.com, inc. Quote

salesforce.com's shares gained 8.3% over the last one month.

The company possesses a Momentum Score of B.

But while the market gained +21.9% in 2017, our top stock-picking screens have returned +115.0%, +109.3%, +104.9%, +98.6%, and +67.1%.
And this outperformance has not just been a recent phenomenon.
Over the years it has been remarkably consistent.
From 2000 - 2017, the composite yearly average gain for these strategies has beaten the market more than 19X over.
